title: ICE when equating TAIT and RPIT in canonical queries

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: T-types
labels.description: Relevant to the types team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2021&gist=ec86c1b56e1fe08951cf0dbb67ea7d7b ```Rust #![feature(type_alias_impl_trait)] type Opaque = impl Sized; fn get_rpit() -> impl Clone {} fn query(_: impl FnOnce() -> Opaque) {} fn test() -> Opaque { query(get_rpit); get_rpit() } ``` While trying to prove the predicate `::Output == Opaque`, we end up equating `get_rpit::opaque#0 == Opaque::opaque#0`. Because inside canonical queries we know nothing about the defining scope (`DefiningAnchor::Bubble`), we register the hidden type as `get_rpit::opaque := Opaque::opaque` instead of `Opaque::opaque := get_rpit::opaque`. Cc @oli-obk. ### Meta Nightly version: 1.69.0-nightly (2023-02-25 34e6673a0473e90ef01a) ### Error output
Backtrace

``` warning: type alias `Opaque` is never used --> src/lib.rs:3:6 | 3 | type Opaque = impl Sized; | ^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(dead_code)]` on by default warning: function `get_rpit` is never used --> src/lib.rs:5:4 | 5 | fn get_rpit() -> impl Clone {} | ^^^^^^^^ warning: function `query` is never used --> src/lib.rs:7:4 | 7 | fn query(_: impl FnOnce() -> Opaque) {} | ^^^^^ warning: function `test` is never used --> src/lib.rs:9:4 | 9 | fn test() -> Opaque { | ^^^^ error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: VecMap([(OpaqueTypeKey { def_id: DefId(0:8 ~ playground[4e8e]::get_rpit::{opaque#0}), substs: [] }, OpaqueTypeDecl { hidden_type: OpaqueHiddenType { span: no-location (#0), ty: Opaque }, origin: FnReturn(DefId(0:4 ~ playground[4e8e]::get_rpit)) })]) | = note: delayed at 0: ::emit_diagnostic 1: ::delay_span_bug:: 2: core::ptr::drop_in_place:: 3: ::enter_canonical_trait_query::, (), rustc_traits::type_op::type_op_prove_predicate::{closure#0}> 4: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 5: as rustc_trait_selection::traits::query::type_op::TypeOp>::fully_perform 6: ::normalize_and_prove_instantiated_predicates 7: ::visit_constant 8: ::visit_body 9: rustc_borrowck::type_check::type_check 10: rustc_borrowck::nll::compute_regions 11: rustc_borrowck::do_mir_borrowck 12: rustc_borrowck::mir_borrowck 13: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 14: ::mir_borrowck 15: ::check 16: ::visit_nested_item 17: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_mod:: 18: rustc_hir_analysis::collect::type_of::find_opaque_ty_constraints_for_tait 19: rustc_hir_analysis::collect::type_of::type_of 20: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 21: rustc_hir_analysis::check::check::check_mod_item_types 22: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 23: ::check_mod_item_types 24: ::for_each_module:: 25: core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once at /rustc/34e6673a0473e90ef01a18eb575392c9e3859747/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1988:9 32: std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start at /rustc/34e6673a0473e90ef01a18eb575392c9e3859747/library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:108:17 33: start_thread 34: clone note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.69.0-nightly (34e6673a0 2023-02-25) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=2 note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack warning: `playground` (lib) generated 4 warnings error: could not compile `playground`; 4 warnings emitted ```

@rustbot label F-type_alias_impl_trait T-types
